#Installing and Loading Packages

```{r}
pacman::p_load(tidyverse, tmap, sf, sfdep)
```

# Importing Data

```{r}
studyArea <- st_read(dsn="data",
                     layer="study_area") %>%
  st_transform(crs=3829)
```
```{r}
stores <- st_read(dsn="data",
                  layer="stores") %>%
  st_transform(crs=3829)
```
##Visualising sf layers

```{r}
tmap_mode("view")
tm_shape(studyArea) +
  tm_polygons() +
tm_shape(stores) +
  tm_dots(col = "Name",
          size = 0.01,
          border.col = "black",
          border.lwd = 0.5) +
  tm_view(set.zoom.limits = c(12,16))

tmap_mode("plot")
```

# Local Colocation Quotients (LCLQ)

```{r}
nb <- include_self(
  st_knn(st_geometry(stores), 6))
```

```{r}
wt <- st_kernel_weights(nb,
                        stores,
                        "gaussian")
```

```{r}
FamilyMart <- stores %>%
  filter(Name == "Family Mart")
A <- FamilyMart$Name
```

```{r}
SevenEleven <- stores %>%
  filter(Name == "7-Eleven")
B <- SevenEleven$Name
```

```{r}
LCLQ <- local_colocation(A, B, nb, wt, 49)
```

```{r}
LCLQ_Stores <- cbind(stores, LCLQ)
```
